message.content:
cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR. 

The paper deals with the task of grounding referring expressions in images, which is a problem in computer vision and natural language processing. Therefore, cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) and cs.CL (Computation and Language) are the most likely categories. The paper proposes a novel approach that involves extracting relationships between objects in the image and the referring expressions, which requires machine learning and artificial intelligence techniques, making cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) a likely category as well. The paper also involves the computation and representation of multimodal contexts, which could fall under cs.LG (Learning) and cs.IR (Information Retrieval).
